Package de.aicard.Social

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.Social.Chat
public class Chat
extends java.lang.Object
Class Chat has 2 Attributes chatHistory where the messages from all participants are stored and participants where the participants are stored Participants can be added to the Chat but only after adding the creator
Author:
Semlali Amine

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Message> chatHistory  
    private java.util.ArrayList<Account> participants  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Chat()  
    Chat​(Account _newParticipant, Account _newCreator, java.lang.String _newMessage)
    Constructor of a Chat.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addParticipant​(Account _newParticipant)
    -participants can be added to the chat with the function addParticipant -the function getChatCreator is used to get the chat creator which is the first in the participants list -the Chat history can be cleared with the function clearHistory -messages can be sent , for that we need the account and the message to create the object Message and then add it to the chat history -messages can be removed from the chat history, with the help of an index argument or the actual Message object argument
    void clearHistory()  
    Account getChatCreator()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Message> getChatHistory()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Account> getParticipants()  
    void removeMessage​(Message _oldMessage)  
    void removeMessageByIndex​(int _oldMessage)  
    void sendMessage​(java.lang.String _newMessage, Account _newSender)  
    void setChatHistory​(java.util.ArrayList<Message> _newChatHistory)  
    void setParticipants​(java.util.ArrayList<Account> _newParticipant)

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Chat

      public Chat()

    • Chat

      public Chat​(Account _newParticipant, Account _newCreator, java.lang.String _newMessage)
      Constructor of a Chat.
      Parameters:
      _newCreator - the person that creates the chat by sending a message to a participant, the creator is the fist person on the participants list
      _newParticipant - the person that receives the first message and is the second on the participants list
      _newMessage - the message to send

    • addParticipant

      public void addParticipant​(Account _newParticipant)
      -participants can be added to the chat with the function addParticipant -the function getChatCreator is used to get the chat creator which is the first in the participants list -the Chat history can be cleared with the function clearHistory -messages can be sent , for that we need the account and the message to create the object Message and then add it to the chat history -messages can be removed from the chat history, with the help of an index argument or the actual Message object argument
